field.name: slideshow_type
field.label: Image type
field.description: Type of image PNG/GIF/JPG etc. (the default is JPG).

field.name: slideshow_folder
field.label: Image folder
field.description: Path to the image folder relative to the site URL (e.g. modules/mod_left_right_image_slideshow/images).

field.name: slideshow_link
field.label: Image link
field.description: A URL to redirect to if the image is clicked upon. (e.g. http://www.gopiplus.com/extensions/)

field.name: slideshow_width
field.label: Width (px)
field.description: Enter the width of the slideshow. (e.g 200)

field.name: slideshow_height
field.label: Height (px)
field.description: Enter the height of the slideshow. (e.g 150)

field.name: slideshow_pause
field.label: Slideshow pause
field.description: Pause time of the slideshow in milliseconds. (e.g 3000)

field.name: slideshow_cycles
field.label: Slideshow cycles
field.description: Gallery will automatically start the slideshow and it will stop number of cycle mentioned in this property. (e.g 5)

field.name: slideshow_persist
field.label: Slideshow persist
field.description: Continue from last viewed slide supported, so this property is true and when the user reloads the page, the slideshow restarts from the last images. (e.g true/false)
